title: Windows 10 Enterprise 2015 LTSB N Privacy en-US x64
description:
murphy78 presents:
Windows 10 Enterprise 2015 LTSB N Privacy en-US

Attention: This is a customized version! It has
default settings added and some hidden packages removed

64-bit Source:
en_windows_10_enterprise_2015_ltsb_n_x64_dvd_6848316.iso

Installation Indexes:
Windows 10 Enterprise LTSB N

Release File: Win10-Enterprise2015-LTSB-N-Privacy-x64-en-US.iso
Size: 2.56 GB
SHA-1: 1283DC6C0F74055A81E32237C827FC7AB74C35BD

Language: en-US (English - United States)

Tools used:
dism for Windows Updates integration and mounted file copy
oscdimg for ISO mastering
install_wim_tweak 1.4.7 for hidden package reveal/hide

DISM (Indexes, boot.wim and winre.wim):
KB3081424

DISM (Index only):
KB3074678, KB3074686 (Superseded but WU nags for them)

Features:
-UEFI/Fat32 support
-NetFx3 pre-integrated
-Windows Defender/Telemetry/and OneDrive Setup have been
completely removed.
-Some privacy options are in place to prevent all of your
searches to go straight to Microsoft servers.
-Only index is pre-activated with AutoKMS from MTK 2.6b1
so you don't need to worry about activation.
-No Windows Store or Online Apps*
*Settings app will still ping data to MS. Avoid it if you're
paranoid

Instructions:
-Use a USB program such as RUFUS to put this on a 4GB+ USB
Flash drive for boot installs, or burn to dvdr.
-CUSTOMIZE YOUR SETUP OPTIONS DURING OOBE and DISABLE all of
the PRIVACY OPTIONS - I have no idea which options will
remain in place if you don't do this.
-I also have no idea if online mode will even work with this.
I do not recommend it as Onedrive setup is already removed.

Final Notes:
-This is not a 100% block of everything internet. You can still
use Windows Update, get new drivers, and everything else you
can normally do.

-If you want to further block various things, you obviously can
do so. I personally recommend checking for updates with the
diag cab file (provided in torrent folder) to hide driver
updates that you may not want. (graphics, anyone?)

-There is no way to choose which updates you want to install.
You either get all or none. If you really want to have a choice
I suggest trying the program: Portable Update

-If you're REALLY paranoid, I suggest going through Windows
Firewall and disabling all of the advanced outbound rules for
various apps and system functionality. Be careful, tho, or
you might break network functionality, internet, or activator.

Credits:
CODYQX4 - AutoKMS Activator
murphy78 - Integration, ISO design and testing

Enjoy,
murphy78 :)
